akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Authority shall submit to the Commission, in accordance with such rules as the Commission may prescribe under section 553 of title 5, any proposed rule, or proposed modification to a rule, of the Authority relating to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Decision on proposed rule or modification to a rule

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Decision on proposed rule or modification to a rule

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Amendment by Commission of rules of authority

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Amendment by Commission of rules of authority The Commission, by rule in accordance with section 553 of title 5, may abrogate, add to, and modify the rules of the Authority promulgated in accordance with this chapter as the Commission finds necessary or appropriate to ensure the fair administration of the Authority, to conform the rules of the Authority to requirements of this chapter and applicable rules approved by the Commission, or otherwise in furtherance of the purposes of this chapter.
